problem_names: lemma nvars_mk_I[simp]: "#\<^sub>V (mk_I I1 I2 fs ss) = Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)"

lemma assigns_mk_I_FO[simp]:
  "m\<^bsup>mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<^esup>FO = (if m < length bs1 then {|I1 (bs1 ! m)|} else {||})"

lemma assigns_mk_I_SO[simp]:
  "m\<^bsup>mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<^esup>SO = (if m < length bs2 then I2 (bs2 ! m) else {||})"

lemma satisfies_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>\<forall>x \<in> set (fos \<phi>). I1 x = J1 x; \<forall>X \<in> set (sos \<phi>). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>
  satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies J1 J2 \<phi>"

lemma dec_I_mk_I_satisfies_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1; set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2; \<AA> = mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>
  satisfies (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1) (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2) \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi>"
lemma ok_I_mk_I[simp]: "ok_I (mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2) bs1"

lemma dec_I1_Extend_FO[simp]:
  "dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 \<AA> P) (x # bs1) = (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1)(x := fMin P)"
lemma dec_I1_Extend_SO[simp]: "dec_I1 (Extend SO i \<AA> P) bs1 = dec_I1 \<AA> bs1"
lemma dec_I2_Extend_FO[simp]: "dec_I2 (Extend FO i \<AA> P) bs2 = dec_I2 \<AA> bs2"

lemma dec_I2_Extend_SO[simp]:
  "dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 \<AA> P) (X # bs2) = (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2)(X := P)"

lemma sat_\<epsilon>: "\<lbrakk>set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1; set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2; ok_I \<AA> bs1\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>
  WS1S.sat \<AA> (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<phi>) \<longleftrightarrow>
  satisfies (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1) (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2) \<phi>"
lemma eqv_sound: "eqv \<phi> \<psi> \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<psi>"
translations: lemma distinct_fos[simp]: "distinct (fos \<phi>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct (fos \<phi>)
by (induct \<phi>) auto
lemma distinct_sos[simp]: "distinct (sos \<phi>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct (sos \<phi>)
by (induct \<phi>) auto

primrec \<epsilon> where
  "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 T = FBool True"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 F = FBool False"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Or \<phi> \<psi>) = FOr (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<phi>) (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<psi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (And \<phi> \<psi>) = FAnd (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<phi>) (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<psi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Not \<phi>) = FNot (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<phi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Ex1 x \<phi>) = FEx FO (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Ex2 X \<phi>) = FEx SO (\<epsilon> bs1 (X # bs2) \<phi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (All1 x \<phi>) = FAll FO (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (All2 X \<phi>) = FAll SO (\<epsilon> bs1 (X # bs2) \<phi>)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Lt x y) = FBase (Less None (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (In x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.In False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Const x n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Const None (index bs1 x) n)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Presb X n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Presb None (index bs2 X) n)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_FO x y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_FO False (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_FO_Offset x y n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Plus_FO None (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y) n)"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_SO X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_SO (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_SO_Inc X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Suc_SO False False (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Max x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Max False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Min x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Min False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Empty X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Empty (index bs2 X))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Singleton X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Singleton (index bs2 X))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Subset X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Subset (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Disjoint X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Disjoint (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Union X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Union (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Inter X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Inter (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"
| "\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Eq_Diff X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Diff(index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"

lift_definition mk_I ::
  "(fo \<Rightarrow> nat) \<Rightarrow> (so \<Rightarrow> nat fset) \<Rightarrow> fo list \<Rightarrow> so list \<Rightarrow> interp" is
  "\<lambda>I1 I2 fs ss. let I1s = map (\<lambda>x. {|I1 x|}) fs; I2s = map I2 ss in (MSB (I1s @ I2s), I1s, I2s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>fun1 fun2 list1 list2.
       \<exists>n I1 I2.
          (let I1s = map (\<lambda>x. {|fun1 x|}) list1;
               I2s = map fun2 list2
           in (MSB (I1s @ I2s), I1s, I2s)) =
          (n, I1, I2) \<and>
          MSB (I1 @ I2) \<le> n
by (auto simp: Let_def)
definition dec_I1 :: "interp \<Rightarrow> fo list \<Rightarrow> fo \<Rightarrow> nat" where "dec_I1 \<AA> fs x = fMin (index fs x\<^bsup>\<AA>\<^esup>FO)"
definition dec_I2 :: "interp \<Rightarrow> so list \<Rightarrow> so \<Rightarrow> nat fset" where "dec_I2 \<AA> ss X = index ss X\<^bsup>\<AA>\<^esup>SO"
lemma nvars_mk_I[simp]: "#\<^sub>V (mk_I I1 I2 fs ss) = Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. #\<^sub>V (mk_I I1 I2 fs ss) = Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)
by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)

lemma satisfies_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>\<forall>x \<in> set (fos \<phi>). I1 x = J1 x; \<forall>X \<in> set (sos \<phi>). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>
  satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies J1 J2 \<phi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos \<phi>). I1 x = J1 x;
     \<forall>X\<in>set (sos \<phi>). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> = satisfies J1 J2 \<phi>
proof (induct \<phi> arbitrary: I1 I2 J1 J2)

proof (state)
goal (26 subgoals):
 1. \<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos T). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos T). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 T = satisfies J1 J2 T

        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos F). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>

        \<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Not \<phi>)). I1 x = J1 x;

case (Or \<phi> \<psi>)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos \<phi>). ?I1.0 x = ?J1.0 x;
   \<forall>X\<in>set (sos \<phi>). ?I2.0 X = ?J2.0 X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> satisfies ?I1.0 ?I2.0 \<phi> =
                    satisfies ?J1.0 ?J2.0 \<phi>
  \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos \<psi>). ?I1.0 x = ?J1.0 x;
   \<forall>X\<in>set (sos \<psi>). ?I2.0 X = ?J2.0 X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> satisfies ?I1.0 ?I2.0 \<psi> =
                    satisfies ?J1.0 ?J2.0 \<psi>
  \<forall>x\<in>set (fos (Or \<phi> \<psi>)). I1 x = J1 x
  \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (Or \<phi> \<psi>)). I2 X = J2 X

goal (26 subgoals):
 1. \<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos T). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos T). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 T = satisfies J1 J2 T
 2. \<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos F). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos F). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 F = satisfies J1 J2 F
 3. \<And>\<phi>1 \<phi>2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.

        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos T). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 T = satisfies J1 J2 T
 2. \<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos F). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos F). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 F = satisfies J1 J2 F
 3. \<And>\<phi> I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>I1 I2 J1 J2.
                   \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos \<phi>). I1 x = J1 x;
                    \<forall>X\<in>set (sos \<phi>). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> =
                                     satisfies J1 J2 \<phi>;
        \<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Not \<phi>)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Not \<phi>)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Not \<phi>) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Not \<phi>)
 4. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Lt x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Lt x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Lt x1 x2) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Lt x1 x2)
 5. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.In x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.In x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.In x1 x2) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.In x1 x2)
 6. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_Const x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_Const x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_Const x1 x2) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Eq_Const x1 x2)
 7. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_Presb x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_Presb x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_Presb x1 x2) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Eq_Presb x1 x2)
 8. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_FO x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_FO x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_FO x1 x2) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Eq_FO x1 x2)
 9. \<And>x1 x2 x3 I1 I2 J1 J2.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (Eq_FO_Offset x1 x2 x3)).
                   I1 x = J1 x;
        \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (Eq_FO_Offset x1 x2 x3)).
           I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_FO_Offset x1 x2 x3) =
                         satisfies J1 J2 (Eq_FO_Offset x1 x2 x3)
 10. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_SO x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_SO x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_SO x1 x2) =
                          satisfies J1 J2 (ws1s.Eq_SO x1 x2)
 11. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (Eq_SO_Inc x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (Eq_SO_Inc x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>

 12. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_Max x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_Max x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_Max x1 x2) =

 13. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_Min x1 x2)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_Min x1 x2)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>

 14. \<And>x I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Empty x)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Empty x)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Empty x) =

 15. \<And>x I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Singleton x)). I1 x = J1 x;
         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Singleton x)). I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Singleton x) =

 16. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.

 17. \<And>x1 x2 I1 I2 J1 J2.

        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Disjoint x1 x2) =

 18. \<And>x1 x2 x3 I1 I2 J1 J2.
        \<lbrakk>\<forall>x\<in>set (fos (ws1s.Eq_Union x1 x2 x3)).

         \<forall>X\<in>set (sos (ws1s.Eq_Union x1 x2 x3)).
            I2 X = J2 X\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 (ws1s.Eq_Union x1 x2 x3) =

lemma dec_I_mk_I_satisfies_cong:
  "\<lbrakk>set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1; set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2; \<AA> = mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>
  satisfies (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1) (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2) \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1;
     set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2;
     \<AA> = mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> satisfies (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1) (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2)
                       \<phi> =
                      satisfies I1 I2 \<phi>
by (rule satisfies_cong) (auto simp: dec_I1_def dec_I2_def)
definition "ok_I \<AA> fs = (\<forall>x \<in> set fs. index fs x\<^bsup>\<AA>\<^esup>FO \<noteq> {||})"
lemma ok_I_mk_I[simp]: "ok_I (mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2) bs1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ok_I (mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2) bs1
unfolding ok_I_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x\<in>set bs1.
       index bs1 x\<^bsup>mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2\<^esup>FO \<noteq> {||}
by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)
proof (induct \<phi> arbitrary: bs1 bs2 v)
case (Ex1 x \<phi>)
from Ex1.hyps[of "Suc v" "x # bs1" bs2] Ex1.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>Suc v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (x # bs1);
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set (x # bs1). Suc v = index (x # bs1) y
  v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) FO
  set (fos (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>Suc v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (x # bs1);
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set (x # bs1). Suc v = index (x # bs1) y
  v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) FO
  set (fos (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (ws1s.Ex1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y
by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
case (Ex2 X \<phi>)
from Ex2.hyps[of v bs1 "X # bs2"] Ex2.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 (X # bs2) \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1;
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (X # bs2)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y
  v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Ex2 X \<phi>)) FO
  set (fos (Ex2 X \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (Ex2 X \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 (X # bs2) \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1;
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (X # bs2)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y
  v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 (Ex2 X \<phi>)) FO
  set (fos (Ex2 X \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (Ex2 X \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y
by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
case (All1 x \<phi>)
from All1.hyps[of "Suc v" "x # bs1" bs2] All1.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>Suc v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (x # bs1);
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2\<rbrakk>

  set (fos (All1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (All1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>Suc v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> (x # bs1) bs2 \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (x # bs1);
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set (x # bs1). Suc v = index (x # bs1) y

  set (fos (All1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs1
  set (sos (All1 x \<phi>)) \<subseteq> set bs2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y
by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
case (All2 X \<phi>)
from All2.hyps[of v bs1 "X # bs2"] All2.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>v \<in> FV (\<epsilon> bs1 (X # bs2) \<phi>) FO;
   set (fos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set bs1;
   set (sos \<phi>) \<subseteq> set (X # bs2)\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y\<in>set bs1. v = index bs1 y

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

by (auto simp: dec_I1_def)

  WS1S.sat \<AA> (\<epsilon> bs1 bs2 \<phi>) \<longleftrightarrow>
  satisfies (dec_I1 \<AA> bs1) (dec_I2 \<AA> bs2) \<phi>"

definition "eqv \<phi> \<psi> =
  (let fs = List.union (fos \<phi>) (fos \<psi>); ss = List.union (sos \<phi>) (sos \<psi>)
  in check_eqv (Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)) (\<epsilon> fs ss \<phi>) (\<epsilon> fs ss \<psi>))"
lemma eqv_sound: "eqv \<phi> \<psi> \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<psi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. eqv \<phi> \<psi> \<Longrightarrow>
    satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> = satisfies I1 I2 \<psi>
unfolding eqv_def Let_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. check_eqv
     (Abs_idx
       (length (List.union (fos \<phi>) (fos \<psi>)),
        length (List.union (sos \<phi>) (sos \<psi>))))
     (\<epsilon> (List.union (fos \<phi>) (fos \<psi>))
       (List.union (sos \<phi>) (sos \<psi>)) \<phi>)
     (\<epsilon> (List.union (fos \<phi>) (fos \<psi>))
       (List.union (sos \<phi>) (sos \<psi>)) \<psi>) \<Longrightarrow>
    satisfies I1 I2 \<phi> = satisfies I1 I2 \<psi>

by (drule check_eqv_sound[rotated, of _ _ _
    "mk_I I1 I2 (List.union (fos \<phi>) (fos \<psi>)) (List.union (sos \<phi>) (sos \<psi>))"])
    (auto simp: sat_\<epsilon> dec_I_mk_I_satisfies_cong)
definition "Thm \<phi> = eqv \<phi> T"
lemma "Thm \<Phi> \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<Phi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Thm \<Phi> \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<Phi>
unfolding Thm_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. eqv \<Phi> T \<Longrightarrow> satisfies I1 I2 \<Phi>
by (drule eqv_sound[of _ _ I1 I2]) simp
